name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/75301TR
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
title: LEGO Star Wars Luke Skywalker's X-Wing Fighter Building Toy 75301
description: Recreate classic scenes from the Star Wars trilogy with this awesome building toy for kids, featuring a LEGO brick-built version of Luke Skywalker’s iconic X-wing Fighter (75301). It’s packed with authentic details to delight fans, including an opening LEGO minifigure cockpit with space behind for R2-D2, wings that can be switched to attack position at the touch of a button, retractable landing gear and 2 spring-loaded shooters. This set includes Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia and General Dodonna LEGO minifigures, each with weapons, plus an R2-D2 LEGO droid figure. A great gift idea for ages 9 and up.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/GXT23TR
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Fashion Dolls
title: Barbie Dreamtopia Rainbow Magic Mermaid Doll with Color Change Feature
description: Dip Barbie Rainbow Magic Mermaid doll into warm water to see her hair and tail instantly transform to reveal a rainbow of pretty pastels! Dip her in ice-cold water to see her change back to her original neon-bright look and relive the transformation again and again. Fairytale lovers will have so much fun transforming Barbie doll’s look and taking her on enchanted undersea adventures! Doll cannot swim or stand alone.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/NGCRYSTALTR
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Science Kits & Experiments
title: National Geographic Mega Crystal Growing Lab - 8 Vibrant Colored Crystals to Grow
description: Grow amazing crystals in 8 different colors with this deluxe crystal growing kit! This Mega Crystal Lab includes a light-up display base to show off your 5 best crystals. This is the perfect project for kids of all ages and serves as a great introduction to science. Everything you need is included in the kit, including a real fluorite crystal specimen for your rock collection. This STEM kit is a fantastic gift for boys and girls.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/F4027TR
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Family Board Games
title: Monopoly Junior: Dinosaur Edition Board Game
description: The Monopoly Junior game meets dinosaur fun! In this Monopoly Junior: Dinosaur Edition board game, kids can imagine a world where they get to buy, sell, and trade their favorite dinosaur properties. It's so much fun for them to place their 'sold' sign on their very own T. Rex, Triceratops, or Velociraptor! The game is for 2-4 players and makes a fun gift for budding paleontologists and Monopoly fans alike, ages 5 and up.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/WGN3421TR
categories: Outdoor & Ride-On Toys > Ride-On Toys > Wagons
title: Radio Flyer All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon
description: The All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon is a classic wagon with rugged, air-filled tires designed to provide a smooth ride on any terrain. This wagon is a multi-purpose transporter for kids or cargo and features a full-sized all-steel seamless body with no-scratch edges and handsome wooden stake sides. An extra-long handle makes it easy to pull, and it folds under the wagon for easy storage. Safety is a priority with controlled turning radius to prevent tipping. Great for outdoor adventures or just a walk in the park!

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU5588A1
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
title: LEGO Creator 3-in-1 Majestic Tiger Building Kit
description: Build and display an incredible Majestic Tiger with this detailed LEGO Creator 3-in-1 set. Kids can choose to build a posable tiger with a red bird, rebuild it into a red panda with bamboo and a bonsai tree, or a koi fish with a water lily. The set offers endless creative play possibilities and makes an impressive display piece for any LEGO fan's room. Contains 755 pieces for a challenging and rewarding build.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU5588B2
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Fashion Dolls
title: Barbie Dreamhouse Adventures Swim 'n Dive Doll
description: Make a splash with the Barbie Swim 'n Dive doll! Dressed in colorful swimwear, Barbie is ready for a day at the pool. Press the lever on her waist to see her legs move in a 'swimming' motion. She comes with a diving board accessory, a cute pet puppy who can also do a flip, and a gold medal to celebrate her victory. Perfect for imaginative water play.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU5588C3
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Science Kits & Experiments
title: National Geographic Mega Volcano Kit
description: Create an epic volcanic eruption! This science kit includes plaster and a volcano mold to build your own volcano, paints to decorate it, and eruption powder to make it explode again and again. Learn about tectonic plates, earthquakes, and volcanic hotspots with the included full-color learning guide. A classic STEM project for any science-loving kid.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU5588D4
categories: Outdoor & Ride-On Toys > Ride-On Toys > Wagons
title: Radio Flyer All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon
description: The ultimate classic wagon for off-road fun! The All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon features a sturdy steel body, real wood stake sides, and rugged 10-inch air tires for a smooth ride on any terrain. An extra-long handle with a controlled turning radius prevents tipping, and it folds under for easy storage. Perfect for hauling kids, toys, or gardening supplies.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU5588E5
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Kids' Card Games
title: Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza Card Game
description: Keep these 5 crazy words in mind: Taco, Cat, Goat, Cheese, Pizza! As soon as there is a match between a card and a spoken word, slap your hand on the central pile of cards. The last one to do so must take them all. The goal is to be the first to get rid of all your cards. A hilariously fun, fast-paced party game for all ages.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/8620TRLEGO01
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
title: LEGO® Starship Explorer Set 75399
description: Build and explore the galaxy with the LEGO® Starship Explorer! This 1,250-piece set features a detailed starship with an opening cockpit, deployable landing gear, and spring-loaded shooters. Includes 5 minifigures: a captain, two crew members, a friendly alien, and a robot sidekick. Perfect for builders and space adventurers aged 9 and up.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/8620TRDOLL02
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Fashion Dolls
title: Sparkle Stylez Dream Fashion Doll - Crystal Gala Edition
description: Dressed for the most glamorous event of the year, the Crystal Gala Edition Dream Doll shines in a floor-length gown adorned with faux crystals and iridescent fabric. She features 15 points of articulation for endless posing possibilities, rooted eyelashes, and a cascade of shimmering hair. Comes with a doll stand, a purse accessory, and a certificate of authenticity.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/8620TRRC03
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Remote Control Cars & Drones
title: Velocity Vortex Pro RC Buggy - 1:10 Scale 4WD Off-Road Racer
description: Conquer any terrain with the Velocity Vortex Pro RC Buggy! This 1:10 scale, 4-wheel drive beast features a powerful brushed motor, oil-filled shocks, and all-terrain tires for high-speed off-road action. The 2.4GHz pistol-grip transmitter provides precise control with a range of up to 100 meters. Includes a rechargeable 7.4V Li-ion battery and USB charger.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/8620TRSTEM04
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Science Kits & Experiments
title: Discovery Zone Ultimate Volcano & Crystal Growing Science Kit
description: Unleash your inner scientist with this 2-in-1 Ultimate Science Kit! Erupt a realistic volcano with bubbling, fizzing lava. Then, grow three different types of dazzling crystals in various colors. This hands-on kit includes everything you need for over 15 exciting experiments, complete with a full-color learning guide. Promotes a love for geology and chemistry.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/8620TRRIDON05
categories: Outdoor & Ride-On Toys > Ride-On Toys > Battery-Powered Ride-Ons
title: Geoffrey's Safari Adventure 12V Ride-On Jeep
description: Embark on a wild adventure with Geoffrey's Safari Adventure Ride-On Jeep! This two-seater 12V ride-on features rugged wheels, realistic engine and horn sounds, and working LED headlights. Drives in forward and reverse with two speed settings (2.5 & 5 MPH). Includes a parent remote control for added safety. Perfect for little explorers aged 3 to 7.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU-LGO-884012A
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Engineering & Building Sets
title: LEGO City Space Explorer Rover and Alien Life Building Set 60431
description: Embark on thrilling space adventures with the LEGO City Space Explorer Rover and Alien Life (60431) building set. This futuristic rover is equipped with 6 large tires and advanced suspension for cruising over rocky planet terrain. Kids can join the space crew as they map the planet surface, discover strange steam-jetting geysers, and encounter alien life. This fun set includes a detailed rover, a small planet surface scene, 2 space crew minifigures, and robot and alien figures. Perfect for imaginative play and storytelling.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU-DOL-991B34C
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Fashion Dolls
Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Collectible Dolls
title: Starlight Dreamer Fashion Doll - Galaxy Gala Edition
description: Make a grand entrance at the Galaxy Gala with the Starlight Dreamer Fashion Doll! This collectible doll features a stunning iridescent gown with planetary embroidery, sparkling cosmic accessories, and long, styleable hair with glitter streaks. Her 11 points of articulation allow for endless dynamic poses. Includes a doll, full outfit, shoes, handbag, necklace, and a doll stand for display. A must-have for collectors and aspiring fashionistas.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU-RDO-1024D5E
categories: Outdoor & Ride-On Toys > Ride-On Toys > Battery-Powered Ride-Ons
title: Geoffrey's Safari Jeep 12V Battery-Powered Ride-On Toy
description: Explore the great outdoors (or just the backyard!) in Geoffrey's Safari Jeep! This 12V ride-on is packed with features, including rugged, all-terrain tires, working LED headlights, a pretend radio with sound effects, and two seats for a passenger. Parents can control the speed with two forward options (2.5 and 5 mph) plus reverse. Power-Lock brake system engages automatically when the foot is lifted from the pedal. Includes 12-volt battery and charger.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU-STM-550E6F7
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Science Kits & Experiments
title: National Geographic Mega Crystal Growing Lab - Grow 8 Colorful Crystals
description: Become a scientist and grow amazing crystals in 8 different colors with this deluxe science kit! The National Geographic Mega Crystal Growing Lab has everything you need to create stunning crystal formations, including an easy-to-follow guide and 4 real gemstone specimens. The kit also features a light-up display base to showcase your 5 best creations. A fun, hands-on, and educational STEM activity for curious kids.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU-BRD-210F8G9
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Family Board Games
title: Geoffrey's Great Toy Run - Exclusive Family Board Game
description: It's a race to the checkout in Geoffrey's Great Toy Run! In this Toys"R"Us exclusive board game, players race through the aisles as their favorite character to collect all the toys on their shopping list. Spin the spinner, move your pawn, and draw action cards that can help you or send your opponents back. Be the first player to fill your shopping cart and make it to Geoffrey's checkout stand to win! A perfect choice for your next family game night.
